label: 葉黄記
本: Five Mountains: The Rinzai Zen Monastic Institution in Medieval Japan . Harvard University Press . 1981
説明文: The diary of Hamuro Sadatsugu (1208-1272), who served as a mid-level courtier for both Go-Saga and the sekkanke Fujiwara. Contains detailed information about court rituals and procedures, spanning from the early 1230s to the early 1250s , though many parts have disappeared.
